___redirectOn.description: Globally defined redirects for certain edge cases

___unknownPlace.description: This place is loaded whenever the requested place doesn't exist.

___places.description: The places for this flow. Keys (that is, place names) must be valid event topics.

___page.description: The page to render for this place.

___targets.description: A map of symbolic targets to place-names reachable from this place.

___redirectToPath.description: The path to redirect to when hitting this place, including the values for relevant place parameters.

___patterns.description: Non-empty list of URL patterns to route to this place. If omitted, the place name (prefixed with a slash) is used as the sole pattern.

___redirectTo.description: The place to redirect to when hitting this place.
